name: Talk Cleric
_source: s;VillagerWoman;Why are they bringing their weapons?{w}{br}Aren't they just supposed to talk?{w}{br}Are we all going to die?
s;Simon;Uh, excuse me. Are you alright?
s;VillagerWoman;Ah! Absolutely fine.{w}{br}What can I do for you?
s;Anuki;Were you talking about weapons?{w}{br}House Morrissey always comes armed.{w}{br}Not a slight against your house or anything,{w} but father always wants to be prepared for betrayal.
s;VillagerWoman;Oh this is bad.{w} This is very bad.
s;VillagerWoman;Why did Lord Morrissey send you?{w}{br}Why are his general and soldiers not enough?{w}{br}What does he want with us?
s;Anuki;Calm down. I'm here of my own volition.{w}{br}I just wanted to check in on the negotiations.
s;VillagerWoman;Of course.{w} Now, if you'll excuse me.
s;Anuki;Why is she so nervous?{w} These are supposed to be routine negotiations...{w}{br}Or maybe something is wrong here after all.
